trans-unit.source: Represents a transformation that is a composite of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> children in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"></xref>.
This class is useful when grouping transformations that are applied to some objects in a scene but not others.
It also allows developers to re-use transformations by defining them once and then adding them to different Transform3DGroup objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
Collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
The default value is an empty collection.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the transformation is affine.
True if the transformation is affine; false otherwise.
Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that indicates the current transform value.
Matrix3D that indicates the current transform value.
